name: The Locker
description:
On just another first day of school, a young student named Skip is heading to his locker. However, this locker is not the average high school locker, but rather an entrance into a cursed dimension. After being plunged into a whole new world, Skip must find his way to defeat the elusive "Rat King” to escape the cursed locker. 

Game creation with RPG Maker MZ - J. Alex G. (GreenBall#4548)

Storybuilding - J. Alex G. (GreenBall#4548), Andreas (BossTyrant#7450), and sovi dang#8828

Graphics/Sprites - RPG Maker MZ, J. Alex G. (GreenBall#4548), and Andreas (BossTyrant#7450)

Music - Andreas (BossTyrant#7450)
